title: Development / building plans conforming to the provisions of Development Plan / Regional Plan and these Regulations for the proposed development work to the scale specified in these Regulations
clause_text: Development / building plans conforming to the provisions of Development Plan / Regional Plan and these Regulations for the proposed development work to the scale specified in these Regulations. The proposals of the Development Plan or Town Planning Scheme or Regional Plan affecting the land. A Site Plan (of required copies) of the area proposed to be developed to the scale.
section: Development undertaken on behalf of Government

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
